titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Estimated Discharge Date (Hospital Provider Spell) - Description

div.p: Estimated Discharge Date (Hospital Provider Spell) is a PLANNED ACTIVITY DATE TIME.
Estimated Discharge Date (Hospital Provider Spell) is the date a PATIENT was estimated to be discharged from a Hospital Provider Spell.

The Estimated Discharge Date (Hospital Provider Spell) is estimated at the point of admission to a Hospital Provider Spell and is different to the Planned Discharge Date (Hospital Provider Spell), which is set once the PATIENT has been confirmed for discharge.
